title: Soul Bound to Scotland
description: The soul leaves the body in death, but what happens in a near-death experience, when we are brought back to life?  Gabriella Fairmont lost everything in a single second. After a painstaking year of heartache and grief, she decided to start over in Scotland.  Declan Douglas has no affection toward American women and is far from pleased to find Gabriella Fairmont in his employ and living on his Scottish Estate.  Declanâ€™s life is thrown into the hands of Gabriella and an odd bond is formed between the two. Until another tragedy calls Gabriella back home to the states. Will their bond be broken forever? Or have they been bound forever?
author: R.L. Dubbert
